pr_title: CDPCP-2598 Add logs around major user sync tasks

timeline.bodyText: Is there a request ID in this context? If there is, is it included in the message? Maybe add the operation ID?
timeline.author: giladwolff

replies.bodyText:
the request id and operation id (exposed as "flow") are part of the MDC.
2020-07-13 14:42:58,291 [usersyncExecutor-1] lambda$internalSynchronizeUsers$7:204 DEBUG c.s.f.s.f.u.UserSyncService - [instance:default] [type:springLog] [crn:] [name:] [flow:ab77043f-84e5-49d1-9e57-fa27e8393a9f] [requestid:2bc3eed0-77ff-4ab2-b5a2-2ce4fd17da4c] [tenant:] [userCrn:] [environment:] [traceId:] [spanId:] Starting RETRIEVE_FULL_UMS_STATE for environments [crn:cdp:environments:us-west-1:foo:environment:8813ff3f-b25b-40f8-9999-569804d48396] ...
replies.author: handavid

timeline.author: giladwolff

timeline.bodyText: this FULL vs PARTIAL is duplicated. maybe it should be move to a variable or a method
timeline.author: lacikaaa

timeline.message:
CDPCP-2598 Add logs around major user sync tasks

Add logs around the major user sync tasks so that we can
easily determine duration of these tasks from the logs.

CDPCP-2598 Add logs around major user sync tasks

Add logs around the major user sync tasks so that we can
easily determine duration of these tasks from the logs.
